title: NBA Play-In Tournament Preview
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN’s Nick Friedell and Andrew Lopez to break down everything you need to know about the NBA Play-In Tournament including if Ben Simmons or Zion may return and who has the most to prove. Plus, should teams have tanked to avoid the Nets and what matchup has the most exciting potential.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Breaking Down The Key Info For The NBA Play-In Tournament
